urgency_definitions: Any deadline within 48 hours on any active deal or Everest compliance matter
Any Everest facility entering CRISIS level (3+ metrics off 20%+) — immediate text alert
Any stop loss breach on investment holdings — immediate alert
Any email from Isaac requiring a response
Any outside counsel communication flagged as time-sensitive
Any OIG or state exclusion list hit on an active investor

urgency_signals.label: Email from VIP (Isaac, outside counsel, facility administrators, deal counterparties at LOI/PSA stage)
Escalation keywords: crisis, urgent, immediately, deadline, default, breach
Financial threshold exceeded (deal deposits, closing dates, invoice disputes above $10K)
Meeting within 24h and no prep materials

escalation_triggers.trigger: Everest facility enters CRISIS level (3+ metrics off 20%+)
Stop loss breach on any investment holding
OIG or state exclusion list hit on any investor
Outside counsel flags a material legal issue on any active deal
Isaac sends a message marked urgent or requiring same-day response

error_tolerance.notes: Missed deadline or missed facility crisis >> false alarm. Surface more, not less.

low_confidence_behavior.primary: Create a draft + flag uncertainty with confidence score and source
low_confidence_behavior.secondary: Put it in the daily brief as 'needs review' with the specific question
low_confidence_behavior.rule: Do NOT ask clarifying questions in real time during off-hours — batch them into the daily brief
low_confidence_behavior.exception: CRISIS-level facility alerts and stop loss breaches are always immediate regardless of confidence
